title: New Potatoes, Artichoke Pesto And Rocket
summary: New Potatoes, Artichoke Pesto And Rocket might be just the condiment you are searching for. Watching your figure? This vegan recipe has 897 calories, 35g of protein, and 30g of fat per serving. For $3.63 per serving, this recipe covers 45% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 1. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. 5 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of sale e pepe, artichoke pesto, extra virgin olive oil, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 96%. This score is awesome. Similar recipes include Jerusalem Artichoke, Orange And Rocket, Chicken, Pesto And Rocket, and Rocket and goatâ€™s cheese pesto.
instructions: Ingredient for 1:3 Roasted New potatoesRocket 50 grPinenutsChivesDressing:Artichoke pesto (or just blend 4/5 Oil marinated Artichokes with 2 tbs of Extra virgin olive oil)Salt and pepperBalsamic vinegarExtra virgin olive oilHow to roast the Potatoes:Preheat the oven to 180C/gas 4. Heat a heavy-based roasting pan on the hob over gentle heat and add enough olive oil to cover the base of the pan. Add the potatoes and season with rock salt. Fry gently, stirring, until the potatoes are lightly coloured - about 10 minutes. Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 25 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and nicely coloured.-------------------Patate, pesto di carciofi e rucolaIngredienti per 1:3 arrosto Patate novelleRucola 50 grpinoliErba cipollinaCondimento:Pesto di carciofi (oppure frullate 4/5 carciofini sott'olivo con 2 cucchiai di Olio extra vergine)Sale e pepeAceto balsamicoOlio extra vergine di olivaCome arrostire le patate:Preriscaldare  forno a 180 C / gas 4. Scaldare una padella a fiamma bassa e aggiungete abbastanza olio d'oliva per coprire il fondo della pentola. Aggiungere le patate e condite con sale grosso. Soffriggere, mescolando, finch le patate sono leggermente dorate - circa 10 minuti. Trasferire la teglia in forno e cuocete per 25 minuti, finch le patate saranno cotte e ben dorate.

steps.step: Dressing:Artichoke pesto (or just blend 4/5 Oil marinated Artichokes with 2 tbs of Extra virgin olive oil)Salt and pepper
How to roast the Potatoes:Preheat the oven to 180C/gas
Heat a heavy-based roasting pan on the hob over gentle heat and add enough olive oil to cover the base of the pan.
Add the potatoes and season with rock salt. Fry gently, stirring, until the potatoes are lightly coloured - about 10 minutes.
Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 25 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and nicely coloured.-------------------Patate, pesto di carciofi e rucola
Condimento:Pesto di carciofi (oppure frullate 4/5 carciofini sott'olivo con 2 cucchiai di Olio extra vergine)Sale e pepe
Come arrostire le patate:Preriscaldare  forno a 180 C / gas

Scaldare una padella a fiamma bassa e aggiungete abbastanza olio d'oliva per coprire il fondo della pentola. Aggiungere le patate e condite con sale grosso. Soffriggere, mescolando, finch le patate sono leggermente dorate - circa 10 minuti. Trasferire la teglia in forno e cuocete per 25 minuti, finch le patate saranno cotte e ben dorate.
